GSD.description:
xen/arm: Fix race in RB-tree based P2M accounting

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v4.19.251 by commit 274cb74da15ed13292fcec9097f04332eb3eea17. For more details please see the references link.
